document_data.name: ''Foestriker''
document_data.creator: [[Uthgar]]
document_data.mainbody: '''''Foestriker''''' was a unique melee weapon wielded by the [[avatar]] of [[Uthgar]], the Father of the Uthgardt.
document_data.Powers: This weapon carried a stout ''+4'' [[enchantment]]. ''Foestriker'' behaved like a ''[[dwarven thrower]]'' when held by Uthgar, circling back to his hands through the air when used as a ranged weapon. The hammer could never be physically harmed or removed from Uthgar's hand without his consent. The weapon was particularly harmful when used against [[giant]]s and [[giant-kin]].
